item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: This page provides an example of using R Markdown. Code block x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 1.27 ## 2 2 2.46 ## 3 3 3.16 ## 4 4 3.56 ## 5 5 5.39 ## 6 6 5.94 ## 7 7 8.20 ## 8 8 9.50 ## 9 9 9.06 ## 10 10 11.32
